select s.*,p.name as PRODUCT_NAME,p.code as PRODUCT_CODE,p.BAR_CODE,p.UNIT,p.SPECIAL_PARAM,p.DESCRIPTION ,P.MADEIN,P.VEHICLE,p.BRAND ,ifnull( ifnull((select b.PRICE from sal_sales_order a,sal_sales_order_line b where a.id = b.ORDER_ID and a.DELETED_FLAG !='Y' and a.CUSTOMER_ID =sso.CUSTOMER_ID and b.PRODUCT_ID = p.id order by b.ID desc limit 1) ,(select pic.SALE_PRICE from mtl_product_price pic where pic.PRODUCT_ID = p.id limit 1)) ,'0') as b_price ,(select sum(o.INVENTORY_QUANTITY) from inv_onhand o where o.PRODUCT_ID = p.ID) as STOCK from sal_sales_order_line s,mtl_product p,sal_sales_order sso where sso.id = s.order_id and s.PRODUCT_ID=p.id
and s.ORDER_ID = #{id}
select ifnull(sum(l.ORDER_QTY*l.PRICE),0) from sal_sales_order_line l where l.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
